name: Aorta
short_description: The main artery carrying oxygenated blood from the heart to the body.

name: Pulmonary Artery
short_description: Carries deoxygenated blood from the right ventricle to the lungs.

name: Superior Vena Cava
short_description: Large vein that returns deoxygenated blood from the upper body to the heart.

name: Inferior Vena Cava
short_description: Large vein that returns deoxygenated blood from the lower body to the heart.

name: Left Atrium
short_description: Receives oxygenated blood from the lungs and pumps it to the left ventricle.

name: Left Ventricle
short_description: Pumps oxygenated blood to the aorta.

name: Right Atrium
short_description: Receives deoxygenated blood from the body and pumps it to the right ventricle.

name: Right Ventricle
short_description: Pumps deoxygenated blood to the pulmonary artery.

name: Pulmonary Veins
short_description: Carry oxygenated blood from the lungs to the left atrium.

name: Coronary Vessels
short_description: Blood vessels supplying the heart muscle with oxygen and nutrients.
